item.title: 南非玉米出口预测上调至 190 万吨
item.description: 南非农业商会将该国截至 2025 年 4 月的玉米出口量预测上调至 190 万吨。【原文：South Africa’s Agricultural Business Chamber has raised its forecast for the country’s corn exports for the year ending April 2025 to 1.9 million tons.】

item.title: 嘉能可关闭美国固定收益新兴市场团队
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，总部位于温哥华的投资银行 Canaccord Genuity Group Inc.【原文：Canaccord Genuity Group Inc., the Vancouver-based investment bank, is dismantling its fixed-income emerging markets business, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Binance 的加密货币市场份额降至四年来最低水平
item.description: Binance 的复兴努力似乎进展缓慢，在大约 2 万亿美元的数字资产市场中，这个最大的加密货币平台的交易量份额在 9 月份跌至四年来的最低水平。【原文：Binance’s rehabilitative efforts appear to be slow to take root, with the largest crypto platform’s share of trading volume in the roughly $2 trillion digital-asset market falling in September to the lowest level in four years.】

item.title: 得克萨斯州监管机构希望数据中心建造发电厂
item.description: 德克萨斯州最高电力监管机构向大科技公司传达了一个信息：如果你想在发电厂旁边建造人工智能数据中心，你可能也必须建造发电厂。【原文：Texas’ top electricity regulator has a message for Big Tech: If you want to build AI data centers next to power plants, you may have to build the power plant, too.】

item.title: 音乐界女性质疑近期重组的影响
item.description:
大型唱片公司高层的变革浪潮是否会破坏缩小性别差距的努力？【原文：

Could a wave of changes at the top of the major labels undermine efforts to shrink the gender gap? 

】

item.title: 特斯拉计划出售 7.83 亿美元债务，由 Prime 租赁公司提供支持
item.description: 特斯拉公司正在进行以主要借款人的汽车租赁为支持的 7.83 亿美元债务销售的上市预热，这将加入近期汽车资产支持证券的热潮。【原文：Tesla Inc. is premarketing a $783 million debt sale backed by prime borrowers’ car leases, which would join a recent surge in automotive asset-backed securities.】

item.title: NFL 正与埃里森的 Skydance 和 RedBird 商谈交易事宜
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，全美橄榄球联盟正在与大卫-埃里森（David Ellison）的 Skydance Media 及其主要投资者之一 RedBird Capital Partners 进行谈判，可能会导致联盟的部分媒体资产易手。【原文：The National Football League is in talks with David Ellison’s Skydance Media and one of his major investors, RedBird Capital Partners, that could result in some of the league’s media assets changing hands, according to people familiar with the conversations.】

item.title: 申银万国计划在伦敦首次公开募股前举行投资者会议
item.description: 据一位熟知内情的人士透露，在线时尚零售商 Shein 正准备在可能的伦敦首次公开募股之前，开始与投资者进行早期的非正式会面，以了解投资者的兴趣。【原文：Online fashion retailer Shein is preparing to start early, informal meetings with investors to gauge interest ahead of a potential initial public offering in London, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 对冲基金 Two Sigma 向外部资本开放房地产部门
item.description: Two Sigma Investments 正准备为一家房地产基金筹集资金，该基金利用了该公司在数据科学方面的专长，将原本属于内部运作的业务向外部资本开放。【原文：Two Sigma Investments is preparing to raise money for a real estate fund that taps the firm’s expertise in data science, opening what had been an internal operation to outside capital.】

item.title: 摩根大通称市场可挫败特朗普动摇美联储的任何努力
item.description: 摩根大通（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：Financial markets stand to temper any potential attempt by Donald Trump to exert too much pressure on the Federal Reserve’s independence should the former Republican president win the US election in November, according to JPMorgan Chase & Co.】

item.title: 美国资产支持债券销售额超过 2023 年总额
item.description: 美国资产担保债券的销售额突破了去年的总和，有望超过大金融危机后的纪录。【原文：Sales of US asset-backed bonds broke through last year’s total and sit in position to overtake the post-Great Financial Crisis record.】

item.title: 随着经济增长，巴西将进口两年来最多的柴油
item.description: 随着农民收获玉米作物，以及巴西经济的复苏支撑了卡车司机的需求，预计本月巴西将进口两年来最多的柴油。【原文：Brazil is expected to import the most diesel in two years this month as farmers harvest the corn crop and the country’s resilient economy supports demand from truckers.】

item.title: 尼日利亚提出新的税收激励措施以吸引天然气投资者
item.description: 一位政府官员表示，尼日利亚希望通过税收减免和该行业新政策框架中提出的其他措施，为深水天然气勘探吸引多达 100 亿美元的新投资。【原文：Nigeria hopes to attract as much as $10 billion of new investments in deep-water gas exploration through tax breaks and other measures proposed in a new policy framework for the industry, according to a government official.】

item.title: 意大利将开放光纤和 FiberCop 联盟视为单一电信网络
item.description: 意大利财政部一位高级官员表示，意大利政府计划将 Open Fiber SpA 和 FiberCop 合并，组建一个单一的意大利网络。【原文：Italy’s government envisages a union of Open Fiber SpA and FiberCop to form a single Italian network, according to a top the finance ministry official.】

item.title: OpenAI 的奥特曼集中力量，迈向 1570 亿美元估值之路
item.description:
这家初创公司因高层管理人员和大部分原班人马的出走而陷入困境。【原文：

The startup has been roiled by an exodus of top executives and much of its original brain trust.

】

item.title: DSV 开始出售 50 亿欧元股票，为收购德铁信可提供资金
item.description: 丹麦货运代理公司 DSV A/S 获得了投资者对 50 亿欧元（55 亿美元）新股销售额一半以上的承诺，为收购德铁信可提供资金。【原文：DSV A/S received commitments from investors for more than half of a €5 billion ($5.5 billion) sale of new shares as the Danish freight-forwarding company finances its takeover of DB Schenker.】

item.title: CVC Capital的马扎认为私募股权投资退出面临压力
item.description: CVC Capital Partners 的一位高层管理人员表示，在退出市场低迷的情况下，私募股权投资公司正在寻找新的投资货币化方式，并将现金返还给投资者。【原文：Private equity firms are finding new ways to monetize investments and return cash to their investors amid a sluggish market for exits, according to a top CVC Capital Partners executive.】

item.title: 富达计划在小额贷款市场上进行最新的共同基金到ETF的转换
item.description: 富达投资公司（Fidelity Investments）正寻求将其两只市政债券共同基金转换为交易所交易基金，此举凸显了这一价值 10 万亿美元的美国投资领域的受欢迎程度。【原文：Fidelity Investments is looking to convert two of its municipal-bond mutual funds into exchange-traded funds, a move that underscores the popularity of the $10 trillion US arena.】

item.title: 伊朗-以色列事件引发货运热潮，油轮市场急剧增长
item.description: 石油运输费率和油轮存量飙升，表明以色列与伊朗的冲突不断升级，可能会鼓励世界某些地区的贸易商确保原油供应。【原文：Rates to ship oil — and tanker stocks — surged in a sign that Israel’s escalating conflict with Iran might be encouraging traders in some parts of the world to secure crude.】

item.title: 美国查封与俄罗斯情报人员有关的黑客所使用的网站
item.description: 据美国司法部和科技巨头微软公司称，美国政府和微软公司已经查封了俄罗斯情报人员及其代理人在美国使用的 107 个网站。【原文：The US government and Microsoft Corp. have seized 107 websites used by Russian intelligence agents and their proxies in the US, according to the Department of Justice and the tech giant.】

item.title: 美国抵押贷款利率七周来首次上调
item.description: 美国的抵押贷款利率在七周内首次上升到 9 月中旬以来的最高水平。【原文：Mortgage rates in the US rose for the first time in seven weeks to the highest level since the middle of September.】

item.title: 谷歌开始在人工智能搜索结果概述中广泛发布广告
item.description: Alphabet Inc.旗下的谷歌公司（Google）正在开始大范围推广广告，这些广告将显示在一些搜索结果顶部的人工智能生成的摘要中或旁边—；此举旨在向投资者表明，耗资巨大的人工智能项目能够带来收益。【原文：Alphabet Inc.’s Google is beginning a wide rollout of ads that will be displayed within and alongside the AI-generated summaries that appear at the top of some search results — a move meant to show investors that costly artificial intelligence projects can generate revenue.】

item.title: Helix Energy Solutions 探索各种选择，包括出售
item.description: 知情人士透露，Helix Energy Solutions Group Inc. 正在探索战略选择，包括潜在的出售。【原文：Helix Energy Solutions Group Inc. is exploring strategic options, including a potential sale, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 中国问题的突然转变意味着 LME 金属贸易商本周将遭受重创
item.description: 来到伦敦参加 LME 周的金属贸易商们在与来自中国的朋友和客户会面时，都感到十分惊喜。【原文：Metals traders arriving in London for LME Week were in for a surprise as they caught up with friends and customers from China.】

item.title: Accel、TCV 和世界银行支持 Zepz 筹集 2.67 亿美元资金
item.description: 前身为 WorldRemit 的汇款服务公司 Zepz 已从新老投资者处筹集了 2.67 亿美元，用于资助其在非洲核心市场及其他市场的扩张。【原文：Zepz, the money transfer service formerly known as WorldRemit, has raised $267 million from new and existing investors to fund expansion in its core African markets and beyond.】

item.title: 加拿大帝国商业银行关注与 45 亿美元企业贷款相关的风险转移
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，加拿大帝国商业银行正在评估投资者对一项与企业贷款相关的重大风险转移交易的兴趣。【原文：Canadian Imperial Bank of Commerce is assessing investors’ interest in a significant risk transfer transaction that would be linked to corporate loans, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: OpenAI 在 66 亿美元融资基础上再获 40 亿美元贷款
item.description: OpenAI 在最近筹得 66 亿美元资金的基础上，又向全球银行申请了 40 亿美元的循环信贷额度，为其发展公司和开发人工智能技术的计划增加了资金储备。【原文：OpenAI has tapped global banks for a $4 billion revolving line of credit on top of its recent $6.6 billion fundraising, adding to its war chest as it plans to grow the company and develop artificial intelligence technology.】

item.title: 亿万富翁甘瓦尔购买 1.08 亿美元股票后，西南航空股价上涨
item.description: 据美国证券交易委员会（Securities and Exchange Commission）周四的文件显示，在InterGlobe Aviation Ltd.董事会成员、亿万富翁联合创始人拉克什-甘瓦尔（Rakesh Gangwal）购买了价值超过 1.08 亿美元的公司股票后，美国西南航空公司（Southwest Airlines Co.【原文：Southwest Airlines Co. shares are climbing after board member and billionaire co-founder of InterGlobe Aviation Ltd., Rakesh Gangwal, purchased over $108 million worth of the company’s stock, according to Securities and Exchange Commission filings on Thursday.】

item.title: 俄罗斯证实其军队控制了乌克兰的武赫勒德尔
item.description: 俄罗斯国防部正式确认，俄罗斯军队控制了顿涅茨克地区具有战略意义的煤矿重镇 Vuhledar。【原文：Russia’s Defense Ministry officially confirmed that its forces took control of the strategically important coal-mining town Vuhledar in the Donetsk region.】

item.title: 美元反弹预示着交易员对全球降息路径的担忧
item.description: 本周美元反弹，因为交易员们开始质疑，与全球同行相比，美联储的降息路径会有多激进。【原文：The dollar is rallying this week as traders start to question how aggressive the Federal Reserve’s interest-rate cutting path will be compared to its global peers.】
